TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewTextBoxCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 显示 控件中的可编辑文本信息。

span.span: Displays editable text information in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一种专用类型的 ，用于显示基于文本的可编辑信息的单个字符串。The class is a specialized type of used to display a single string of editable text-based information. 当前选定的 承载一个 控件，用户可以在其中编辑单元格的值（假设 的 属性设置为 `false`）。The currently selected hosts a control in which the user can edit the cell's value (assuming the property of the is set to `false`). 是专用于保存此类型的单元格的列类型。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下， 初始化为新的 。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在现有 之后对列中的单元格进行样式设置，请将列的 属性设置为要用作模式的单元格。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 此列的单元格相关属性是模板单元的名称相同的属性的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元的属性值将仅影响基于更改后添加的模板的单元格。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 但是，更改列的单元格相关属性值将更新列中的模板单元和所有其他单元，并在必要时刷新列显示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 作为 的模板。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 对列中的任何单元格所做的样式更改都将影响列的所有单元格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

para.span: 当从 派生并向派生类添加新属性时，请确保重写 方法，以便在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 创建此单元的精确副本。

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当从 派生并将新属性添加到派生类时，重写 方法。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保还复制已添加到派生类的任何属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CreateAccessibilityInstance` 方法返回的 对象仅支持 [UI 自动化](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview)属性，该属性仅适用于从 .NET Framework 4.7.2 开始重新编译为 .NET Framework 目标版本的应用程序。The object returned by the `CreateAccessibilityInstance` method supports the [UI automation](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview) property only in applications that are recompiled to target versions of the .NET Framework starting with .NET Framework 4.7.2. 面向 .NET Framework 早期版本但在 .NET Framework 4.7.2 上运行的应用程序可以通过兼容性开关选择使用此功能。Applications that target an earlier version of the .NET Framework but are running on .NET Framework 4.7.2 can opt in to this feature by using a compatibility switch. 有关其他信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中辅助功能的新增功能](/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility)。For additional information, see [What's New in Accessibility in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础格式化值的类型始终是 的，因为文本框仅处理文本信息The type of the underlying formatted value is always because a text box only handles text information ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定单元格内容的类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of the cell contents. 在此示例中， 属性用于在尝试转换值之前确定该单元是否包含 。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the cell contains a before attempting to convert the value. 此示例是 事件中提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法根据基 方法中所述初始化寄宿编辑控件。The method initializes the hosted editing control as described in the base method. 对于每个调用，此方法还设置了编辑控件的以下视觉特性：For every invocation, this method also sets the following visual attributes of the editing control: - 属性设置为 。The property is set to . - 和 属性设置为 `true`。The and properties are set to `true`. - 属性设置为 `initialFormattedValue` 参数。The property is set to the `initialFormattedValue` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool KeyEntersEditMode (System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs e);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool KeyEntersEditMode(class System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Function KeyEntersEditMode (e As KeyEventArgs) As Boolean
public: override bool KeyEntersEditMode(System::Windows::Forms::KeyEventArgs ^ e);
override this.KeyEntersEditMode : System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs -> bool

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，表示按下的键。

span.span: A that represents the key that was pressed.

summary.span: 确定是否应基于给定键启动编辑模式。

span.span: Determines if edit mode should be started based on the given key.

returns.span: 如果应启动编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if edit mode should be started; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件的 属性设置为 或 时，控件将使用此方法来确定在此单元格有焦点的情况下，用户按下的键是否为按下的键。When the property of the control is set to or , the control uses this method to determine whether a key other than F2 that is pressed by the user while this cell has focus will cause the cell to enter edit mode. 如果 e 参数指示不修改的普通数据输入键（如字母、数字、标点符号或空格键），则此方法将返回 `true`，其中不包括 SHIFT + SPACE，此控件用于选择。This method returns `true` if the e parameter indicates an ordinary data-entry key (such as a letter, number, punctuation mark, or the SPACE key) unmodified by ALT or CTRL, excluding SHIFT+SPACE, which is used by the control for selection purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的默认键盘和鼠标处理](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control).

related.span: Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的默认键盘和鼠标处理

span.span: Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

summary.span: 获取或设置可以在文本框中输入的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box.

value.span: 可以在文本框中输入的最大字符数，默认值是 32767。

span.span: The maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box; the default value is 32767.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不影响通过单元格的值以编程方式或通过单元格格式输入的文本长度。The property does not affect the length of text entered programmatically through the cell's value or through cell formatting. 它仅影响用户可以输入和编辑的内容。It affects only what the user can input and edit. 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

span.span: The value is less than 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重置实例的单击状态，以确保在退出后重新输入该单元格需要双击才能启动编辑模式。Resets the instance's click state to ensure that leaving then re-entering the cell requires a double click to start edit mode. 此方法类似于 方法。This method is similar to the method. 在引发 事件的同一情况下，它会被调用，但实际上不会引发事件。It is called in the same circumstances in which a event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
